statements: UPDATE vital_signs SET heart_rate=80, blood_pressure='120/80' WHERE patient_id='12345';
UPDATE vital_signs SET oxygen_level=95, blood_pressure='130/85', heart_rate=75 WHERE patient_id='67890';
UPDATE vital_signs SET heart_rate = 80, blood_pressure = '120/80' WHERE patient_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012';
UPDATE vital_signs SET oxygen_level = 95, heart_rate = 70 WHERE patient_id = '87654321-4321-4321-4321-210987654321';
UPDATE VitalSigns SET heart_rate = 80, blood_pressure = 120 WHERE patient_id = 123;
UPDATE Alerts SET alert_message = 'High heart rate detected', alert_timestamp = '2022-01-15 13:30:00' WHERE alert_id = 7;
UPDATE VitalSigns SET heart_rate = 80, blood_pressure = 120 WHERE patient_id = 1;
UPDATE Alerts SET alert_message = 'High fever detected', alert_timestamp = '2022-01-21 09:30:00' WHERE patient_id = 2;
UPDATE Patient_Data SET heart_rate = 75 WHERE patient_id = 1;
UPDATE Alert_Log SET alert_type = 'High Heart Rate' WHERE patient_id = 2;
UPDATE Patient_Data SET heart_rate = 80, blood_pressure_systolic = 120 WHERE patient_id = 1;
UPDATE Provider_Alerts SET read_status = true WHERE provider_id = 2;
UPDATE patients SET age = 35, address = '123 Main St' WHERE patient_id = 1001;
UPDATE vitals SET blood_pressure = '120/80', heart_rate = 75 WHERE patient_id = 1002;
UPDATE patients SET age = 30, address = '123 Main St' WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE vitals SET heart_rate = 80, temperature = 98.6 WHERE patient_id = 101;
UPDATE Patient SET patient_age = 30, patient_name = 'John Doe' WHERE patient_id = 1;

UPDATE Patient SET patient_age = 35, patient_gender = 'F' WHERE patient_id = 101;
